## Functions

### Functions with conditions

```{r}

animal_age <- function(animal, age){
  if(animal == "dog") {
    print(paste("Your", animal, "age is", age*7))
  }
  else if(animal == "goat") {
    print(paste("Your", animal, "age is", age*4.5))
  }
}
animal_age("goat", 14)
animal_age("dog", 14)
```
